examples.example: 原来生活中有这么多美好等待我们去发现。

translate.english: Originally there are so many beautiful things in life waiting for us to discover.

examples.example: 原来只要我们保持积极的心态，就能感受到世界的美好。

translate.english: Originally, as long as we keep a positive attitude, we can feel the beauty of the world.

examples.example: 原来只要努力前行，就会离梦想越来越近。

translate.english: Originally, as long as you move forward hard, you will get closer and closer to the dream.
